meta.title: Returns & Exchanges - MALIKLI1992
meta.description: Learn about our returns and exchanges policy for MALIKLI1992 products, including warranty information and conditions.

hero.title: Returns & Exchanges
hero.subtitle: Our policy for product returns, exchanges, and warranty information

overview.title: Return Policy Overview
overview.description1: You can return products of proper quality if their appearance, factory tags, labels, and consumer properties are preserved, and you have a document confirming the purchase. Products that have been used cannot be returned.
overview.description2: According to Article 28 of the Law of the Republic of Belarus dated January 9, 2002, "On Consumer Protection" (hereinafter referred to as the Law), which regulates the return and exchange of products of proper quality, the consumer has the right to return a product of proper quality or exchange it for a similar product within fourteen days.

conditions.title: Return Conditions
conditions.intro: For a return to be accepted, the following conditions must be met:
list: The product must be in its original condition with all tags and labels intact
Original packaging must be undamaged and complete
You must provide proof of purchase (receipt or order confirmation)
The product must not show any signs of use or wear
The return must be initiated within 14 days of receiving the order

howTo.title: How to Return
howTo.intro: To initiate a return or exchange, please follow these steps:
steps: Contact our customer service team via email or phone within the 14-day return period
Provide your order number and details about the items you wish to return
Our team will provide you with a return authorization and instructions
Package the items securely in their original packaging
Send the package to the address provided by our customer service team
howTo.conclusion: Once we receive and inspect the returned items, we will process your refund or exchange within 5-7 business days.

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.description: If you wish to exchange an item for a different size or color, please follow the same procedure as for returns. Note that exchanges are subject to availability. If the desired replacement is not available, we will issue a refund for the returned item.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Refunds will be processed using the original payment method. Please allow 5-7 business days for the refund to appear in your account after we have processed your return. Please note that shipping costs are non-refundable unless the return is due to our error.

defectiveItems.title: Defective Items
defectiveItems.intro: If you receive a defective item, please contact our customer service team immediately. For defective products, we offer:
defectiveItems.conclusion: Please provide photos of the defective item when contacting our customer service team to help us resolve the issue promptly.

questions.question: How long do I have to return an item?
questions.answer: You have 14 days from the date of receiving your order to initiate a return or exchange.

questions.question: Can I return a product if I've worn it or removed the tags?
questions.answer: No, products must be in their original, unused condition with all tags and labels intact to be eligible for return or exchange.

questions.question: Do I have to pay for return shipping?
questions.answer: Yes, customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the return is due to a mistake on our part or a defective product.

questions.question: How long will it take to process my refund?
questions.answer: Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund within 5-7 business days. It may take an additional few days for the refund to appear in your account, depending on your payment provider.

questions.question: What if the item I want to exchange is out of stock?
questions.answer: If the item you want to exchange for is not available, we will issue a refund for the returned item or offer you an alternative product of equal value.

questions.question: Can I return limited edition or sale items?
questions.answer: Yes, limited edition and sale items follow the same return policy as regular items, provided they meet all the conditions for returns (unused, tags intact, within 14 days).

assistance.title: Need More Assistance?
assistance.description: If you have any other questions about returns, exchanges, or our warranty policy, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team:

meta.title: Payment Methods - MALIKLI1992
meta.description: Learn about the available payment methods for MALIKLI1992 products, including credit card options and other payment information.

hero.title: Payment Methods
hero.subtitle: Information about available payment options for your orders

cards.title: Credit & Debit Cards
cards.description: You can pay for your order using bank cards from the following payment systems:

visa.title: Visa
visa.description: All Visa debit and credit cards are accepted

mastercard.title: Mastercard
mastercard.description: All Mastercard debit and credit cards are accepted

security.title: Payment Security
security.description: All payments are processed securely using SSL encryption. Your card details are never stored on our servers, ensuring maximum security for your financial information.

charging.title: When Will I Be Charged?
charging.description: Your card will be charged immediately upon completing your purchase. The charge will appear on your statement as "MALIKLI1992".

otherMethods.title: Other Payment Methods
otherMethods.description: Currently, other payment methods are not available. If you have questions or special requests regarding payment, please contact our customer support team.

safety.question: Is it safe to use my credit card on your website?
safety.answer: Yes, all payments on our website are processed using secure SSL encryption. Your card details are protected and never stored on our servers.

international.question: Do you accept international credit cards?
international.answer: Yes, we accept Visa and Mastercard issued by banks worldwide. Please note that international transactions may be subject to currency conversion fees from your bank.

whenCharged.question: When will my card be charged?
whenCharged.answer: Your card will be charged immediately when you complete your purchase. The transaction will appear as "MALIKLI1992" on your statement.

digitalWallets.question: Can I pay with PayPal or other digital wallets?
digitalWallets.answer: Currently, we only accept payment via Visa and Mastercard. We are working on adding more payment methods in the future.

declined.question: What should I do if my payment is declined?
declined.answer: If your payment is declined, please verify that your card details are entered correctly. If the issue persists, contact your bank to ensure there are no restrictions on your card for online purchases. You can also reach out to our customer support team for assistance.

assistance.title: Need More Assistance?
assistance.description: If you have any other questions about payment methods or experience any issues with your transaction, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team:

meta.title: About Us - MALIKLI1992
meta.description: Learn more about MALIKLI1992, our story, vision, and commitment to exclusive fashion drops and premium pieces.

hero.title: About MALIKLI1992
hero.subtitle: Redefining style with exclusive drops and premium craftsmanship

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: MALIKLI1992 was born from a passion for authentic self-expression through fashion. Established by visionary entrepreneur Emin Malikli, our brand represents the perfect fusion of cultural heritage and contemporary style.
story.paragraph2: What sets us apart is our commitment to the drop model — meticulously curated collections released in limited quantities at scheduled times. Each drop is more than just clothing; it's an artistic statement that embodies our dedication to quality, innovation, and uniqueness.
story.paragraph3: Every piece in our collection tells a story of craftsmanship and creative vision, designed for those who appreciate the extraordinary in their everyday style.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At MALIKLI1992, our mission is to create a vibrant community of fashion enthusiasts who value exclusivity, authenticity, and exceptional quality. We believe in the power of limited-edition pieces that stand out from mass-produced fashion, creating meaningful connections between our creations and those who wear them.
mission.paragraph2: Through our unique approach to fashion, we aim to redefine the relationship between brands and consumers, making each purchase an event to remember and celebrate.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: We envision MALIKLI1992 as a global leader in exclusive fashion drops, setting new standards for creativity and innovation in the industry. Our goal is to build a worldwide community united by appreciation for thoughtfully designed, limited-edition pieces that transcend seasonal trends.
vision.paragraph2: In this vision, fashion becomes more than just clothing—it's a form of personal expression, a statement of individuality, and a celebration of artistry that resonates with those who wear our pieces.

exclusivity.title: Exclusivity
exclusivity.description: We create products in limited quantities, ensuring each piece maintains its unique value and special place in your collection.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: From fabric selection to final stitching, we never compromise on materials, craftsmanship, or attention to detail.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries in design, technology, and sustainability to bring fresh perspectives to fashion.

community.title: Community
community.description: We nurture a passionate community of style enthusiasts who share our appreciation for unique fashion and creative expression.

join.title: Join Our Movement
join.description: Become part of the MALIKLI1992 community by joining our exclusive waitlist. Be the first to know about upcoming drops, special releases, and gain early access to our most coveted pieces.

meta.title: Contact Us - MALIKLI1992
meta.description: Get in touch with MALIKLI1992 for inquiries about our exclusive fashion drops, collaborations, or customer support.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: How we process and protect your personal data

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.content: This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing and protecting personal data of users provided when using the MALIKLI1992 website (hereinafter referred to as the "Website").

legal.title: 2. Legal Basis
legal.content: Personal data processing is carried out in accordance with the Law of the Republic of Belarus dated November 15, 2021, "On Personal Data Protection" and other regulatory acts of the Republic of Belarus.

personalData.title: 3. Personal Data
personalData.description: We may collect the following personal data:
list: Other data provided by the user voluntarily

purposes.title: 4. Data Processing Purposes
purposes.description: Personal data is processed for the purpose of:
list: Sending informational and promotional materials (with consent)

consent.title: 5. Consent to Data Processing
consent.content: The user gives consent to the processing of their personal data when registering on the Website or placing an order, by checking the appropriate box.

storage.title: 6. Data Storage and Protection
storage.content: We take all necessary organizational and technical measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 7. User Rights
rights.description: The user has the right to:
list: Receive information about their personal data
Request changes to or deletion of their data

transfer.title: 8. Transfer of Data to Third Parties
transfer.content: Personal data may be transferred to third parties only in cases provided for by the legislation of the Republic of Belarus or with the user's consent.

changes.title: 9. Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. Changes take effect from the moment they are published on the Website.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about the processing of your personal data, you can contact us at:

assistance.title: Need More Assistance?
assistance.description: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please don't hesitate to contact us:

hero.title: Terms & Conditions

agreement.content: By accessing and using the MALIKLI1992 website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

company.title: 2. Company Information
company.content: These terms are entered into by you and Limited Liability Company "MALIKLI1992" (hereinafter referred to as "Company", "we", "us", or "our").

license.title: 3. Use License
license.description: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on MALIKLI1992's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
restrictions: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
license.termination: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by MALIKLI1992 at any time.

products.title: 4. Product Information and Orders
products.description: We strive to provide accurate product descriptions, prices, and availability information. However, we do not warrant that product descriptions or other content is accurate, complete, reliable, or error-free.
terms: All orders are subject to acceptance and availability
We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order
Prices are subject to change without notice
Product images are for illustration purposes and may vary from actual products

payment.title: 5. Payment Terms
payment.description: Payment must be made at the time of purchase using one of our accepted payment methods (Visa, Mastercard). By providing payment information, you represent that you are authorized to use the payment method.
terms: We reserve the right to verify payment information
Currency conversion fees may apply for international transactions
Payment disputes should be directed to our customer service team

shipping.title: 6. Shipping and Delivery
shipping.description: Shipping terms are detailed in our Shipping Information page. Delivery times are estimates and are not guaranteed. Risk of loss and title for items pass to you upon delivery to the carrier.

returns.title: 7. Returns and Exchanges
returns.description: Our returns and exchanges policy is governed by Belarus consumer protection law, specifically Article 28 of the Law "On Consumer Protection Rights". Full details are available on our Returns & Exchanges page.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on MALIKLI1992's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. MALIKLI1992 makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

limitations.title: 9. Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall MALIKLI1992 or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on MALIKLI1992's website, even if MALIKLI1992 or a MALIKLI1992 authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

accuracy.title: 10. Accuracy of Materials
accuracy.content: The materials appearing on MALIKLI1992's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. MALIKLI1992 does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. MALIKLI1992 may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.

links.title: 11. Links
links.content: MALIKLI1992 has not reviewed all of the sites linked to our website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by MALIKLI1992 of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

modifications.title: 12. Modifications
modifications.content: MALIKLI1992 may revise these terms of service at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

governing.title: 13. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Belarus. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Belarus.

meta.title: International Shipping - MALIKLI1992
meta.description: Explore our international delivery options. Fast, reliable shipping to over 140 countries worldwide with detailed delivery times.

hero.title: Worldwide Shipping
hero.subtitle: Fast, reliable delivery to over 140 countries with comprehensive service options

globalReach.title: Our Global Reach
globalReach.subtitle: We proudly ship to over 140 countries worldwide, bringing MALIKLI1992's exclusive fashion to discerning customers across the globe.

services.question: What shipping services do you offer?
services.answer: We offer multiple shipping options including International EMS (Express Mail Service), Priority and Non-Priority International Parcels. Domestic delivery within Belarus takes 1-3 business days, while international shipping ranges from 5-21 days depending on destination and service type.

tracking.question: Do you provide tracking information?
tracking.answer: Yes, all shipments include full tracking from dispatch to delivery. You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order is shipped, allowing you to monitor your package's progress throughout its journey.

timeframes.question: What are the delivery timeframes?
timeframes.answer: Delivery times vary by destination and service: EMS to Europe (5-10 days), North America (7-14 days), Asia (5-12 days), Australia (8-15 days), and Russia (3-7 days). Standard parcels take longer, ranging from 7-28 days depending on priority level and destination.

customs.question: Are there any customs duties or taxes?
customs.answer: Customs duties and taxes may apply depending on your country's regulations and the value of your order. These fees are the responsibility of the recipient and are not included in our shipping costs. Processing through customs may also affect delivery times.

delays.question: What factors can affect delivery times?
delays.answer: Several factors can impact delivery times including customs clearance, remote destinations, national holidays, weather conditions, and peak shipping seasons. We recommend allowing extra time during holiday periods and for deliveries to remote areas.

coverage.question: Which countries do you ship to?
coverage.answer: We ship to over 140 countries worldwide. Neighboring countries like Russia typically receive faster delivery (3-7 days), while more distant locations may take 20-35 days for remote areas. Contact us if you're unsure about delivery to your specific location.
